wordpressPage.title: HXL standard (1.0 alpha)
wordpressPage.content:
Note: This is an obsolete version of the HXL standard, for historical reference only. Please see hxlstandard.org/standard/ for the latest release..

HXL tagging conventions
How to add HXL hashtags to a spreadsheet.
HXL tag dictionary
A base list of recommended hashtags for humanitarian datasets.
